title: Hello World
description: This is my first blog post using Contentlayer and Fumadocs.
author: Lora

body.raw:
# Hello World

Welcome to my blog! This post is rendered using **Contentlayer** and displayed with **Fumadocs UI**.

## Features

- MDX Support
- Fast build times
- Type-safe content

```typescript
console.log("Hello, World!");
```
